name: The Space Capsule Decending Game
description:
BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD THE GAME, PLEASE READ THIS DESCRIPTION:

Before I'll say anything, I just want to say that yes, I'm aware that their are bugs where objects spawn in the middle of the screen and I dont want to fix the bugs because let's just say I have a bigger fish to fry.

HOW DOES THE GAME WORK:

In this game, you play as a space capsule that has to try and reach earth in the span of  2 minutes.(I know that it isn't realistic at all but it's a video game, get over it)you have to dodge obstacles as the debris get's in your way. each time an object hits you, you will lose 15% of your health . 

SPOILERS AHEAD, SKIP THIS PART IF YOU WANT TO BE SPOILER FREE. READ THIS WHEN YOU'RE FINISHED WITH THE GAME:

At the ending scene, there's a cutscene where the space capsule falls down to the ground but there's a menu  that shows up in the front of the scene. I just want to also say that this isn't a bug. It may look like it is but it's not, don't worry about it. Well the number at the bottom left at the ending scene is nothing. don't mention it. 

NOTES:

when you die in the game, the game will automatically restart the level.

the number at the bottom left coner is a timer that counts down to 0. Once it hits 0, you beat the game

This game is very small so don't expect much.

WHAT ARE THE CONTROLS:

Move Right: D or right arrowkey

Move Left: A or left arrowkey

Move Up: W or up arrowkey

Move Down: S or down arrowkey

Pause: Escape button
